A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie had no narrative\, and the events that take place in it are out of context in the Star Wars universe.  The tone was off (War movie but lots of jokes)\, which killed any suspense.  Weirdly\, it seemed to be trying to insult fans (ex: \"Take that stupid mask off\,\" \"Did you expect me to come out with my Laser Sword\").  Sad\, really.
